name: Code Breakers (sreetunks, Tee97, RuKira)
description:
Play as a User entering a Computer Simulation to fight Malware that's corrupting the System in this Turn-based Tactics Game.

Controls

  • Left-Click to select a target Unit/Position
  • Right-Click to Interact with Doors and Level Exits
  • Space to Center Camera on Selected Unit
  • Edge Pan to manually control the Camera
